summary: This bill, the Strategic Homeland Information Education and Learning Defense Act of 2025 (SHIELD Act of 2025), mandates the Secretary of Defense to establish a pilot program for the Armed Forces. This program aims to train service members on safe and responsible digital information interaction. The curriculum includes identifying misinformation, assessing source credibility, understanding online impacts, protecting personal information, and recognizing information-based threats.  The program will employ diverse training methods and participants, followed by a post-program survey and report to Congress evaluating effectiveness and making recommendations for a permanent training program.
